Description: Blue glazed composition shabti with a blue painted lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and parallel hands in relief holding a blue painted adze and the string of the seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with blue painted Hieroglyphs, illegible; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the foot.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
